name: Dice Defense (WittyWare)
description:
Premise

Dice Defense is a tower defense game where you defend against various dice trying to attack you. Every dice behaves differently, so you'll need to prepare for every situation by creating a variety of defensive towers. Good luck and may RNG shine favorably upon you!

Gameplay

Defend your way through 3 levels, each one more difficult than the last. Choose from 4 different towers that can all be upgraded twice to have their range extended or sold if they're no longer needed. After each round, the defeated dice pool is rolled to determine your reward.

Controls

  • Left mouse button for selecting tiles, placing towers and clicking buttons.
  • Right mouse button to cancel an action.

Credits

This game was part of the 2022 GMTK game jam, with the theme Roll of the Dice. I used various asset packs from Humble Bundle and Fanatical for the sounds, music and 3D models.
